Event Reputation
Event
Event Highlights
About PvP Reward Track
NEW PVP REWARD TRACK ADDED

The PvP Reward Track contains PvP-specific rewards for doing PvP activities in the game. The track can be completed and run again to get a different selection of rewards, with more prestigious rewards becoming available as more tracks are completed.
PVP XP
Progress your track by engaging in PvP Missions, War, Outpost Rush, Capturing Forts, Defeating other players and 3v3 Arenas.
AZOTH SALT

Azoth Salt is a currency that allows you to acquire rewards from the PvP Track. You can gain Azoth Salt by engaging in War, Outpost Rush, 3v3 Arenas, PvP Missions, killing players in the open world, and earning XP while flagged.
REWARDS
Choose between unique rewards such as prestige armor and weapons, emotes, currencies, and consumables.
Weapon XP Boost
WEAPONS XP BONUS THIS WEEK
The bonus is activated on:
Gathering XP Boost
GATHERING XP BONUS THIS WEEK
The bonus is activated on:
Level XP Boost
CHARACTER LEVEL XP BONUS EVENT
The bonus is activated on:
Refining XP Boost
REFINING XP BONUS THIS WEEK
The bonus is activated on:
XP Bonus Extravaganza
XP BONUS EXTRAVAGANZA
The bonus is activated on:
Endgame

At level 60, you're now able to<font color="#ffdb7a"> upgrade your equipment </font>to higher gear scores. To do this, you'll need to harvest Gypsum from various Level 60 activities and locations. Visit a<font color="#ffdb7a"> Gypsum Kiln </font>to learn more.
ENDGAME ACTIVITIES
<font color="#ffffff" >You've recently achieved Max Level - there's plenty more to do.</font>
Endgame Expeditions
Endgame Expeditions, including rotating weekly Mutations for the best rewards.
Outpost Rush
Outpost Rush, a 20 v 20 battleground.
Elite Areas
Elite landmarks, Trial Arenas, and open world challenges for groups.
UPGRADE YOUR GEAR

At level 60, you're now able to<font color="#ffdb7a"> upgrade your equipment </font>to higher gear scores. To do this, you'll need to harvest Gypsum from various Level 60 activities and locations. Visit a<font color="#ffdb7a"> Gypsum Kiln </font>to learn more.
About Endgame Activities
Expedition Group Finder!

Available now from the map! Access all Expeditions (as long as you have visited it once) by clicking on the Expedition's icon. From here you can browse or post Group Finder lobbies, or enter the Expedition directly with your existing group.
About Group Finder
So Fresh, So Clean
Fresh worlds. Fresh economy. Fresh start.
New Content
Arm yourself with the all-new Great Sword and Heartgem and journey to the deserts of Brimstone Sands, or start the new Main Story quest!
Twitch Event
Begin your journey in a fresh world, and watch your favorite streamers do the same in the Return to Aeternum event on Twitch until 11/18.
New Cosmetics
Brimstone Sands, Great Sword, and Nightveil Hallow items are now available in the store. Don't forget to pickup your free anniversary skins!
Brimstone Sands

With the new Great Sword and Heartgem ability runes, explore the new Brimstone Sands zone and the Ennead Expedition, or experience the revamped Main Story Quest with new locations, NPCs, challenges, and rewards.\n\nTo access the main storyline quests in Brimstone Sands, players must have completed the quest "A Selfless Nature" in Edengrove and the quest "Strider of the Sands," which can be picked up in multiple locations.
Return to Aeternum

Start a new character on worlds that are certified fresh, or follow your favorite streamers in the Return to Aeternum event on Twitch. Watch as they battle for glory on fresh worlds until 11/18.\n\nhttp://www.twitch.tv/playnewworld
Fresh Start Worlds
Fresh Start Worlds are now live! Only new characters can be a part of these worlds.
About Return to Aeternum

About Battle For New World
Starts on {startDate}

Free Weekend
The Free Weekend is in progress.

During this limited-time event, experience the new Brimstone Sands zone, revamped Main Story Quest, and latest updates to New World for free!

To play with friends, characters must be on the same world. Free players enjoy unlimited session times unless there is a queue for the world (at the end of a session, free players will be asked to requeue).

New players can also save 50% on the Standard and Deluxe editions of New World when purchased between December 15 at 10AM PT and January 5 at 10AM PT.

Store
Winter Convergence

Protect yourself from the ravages of Forever Winter with new cosmetics available in the store! You'll want to kit yourself out with the latest winter weapons and apparel when the days grow shorter and long nights of terror await. Check the store regularly for free gifts in December and take advantage of our winter sales! Special unvaulted content goes on sale 12/13 and last year's Winter Convergence gear arrives on 12/20!
About Winter Convergence
Store
Winter Dragon

Is the shape of winter the shadow of a dragon? Visit the store for new cosmetics kissed by the frosty breath of the serpent! Don't get caught unprepared when less lethal combat breaks out! Pick up the Slap Fight emote or opt for the Tiptoe Walk in order to sneak past any violent squabbles instead!
About Winter Dragon
Housing Decor
